name: Beastmaster
bio:
Karroch was born a child of the stocks. His mother died in childbirth; his father, a farrier for the Last King of Slom, was trampled to death when he was five. Afterward Karroch was indentured to the king's menagerie, where he grew up among all the beasts of the royal court: lions, apes, fell-deer, and things less known, things barely believed in. When the lad was seven, an explorer brought in a beast like none before seen. Dragged before the King in chains, the beast spoke, though its mouth moved not. Its words: a plea for freedom. The King only laughed and ordered the beast perform for his amusement; and when it refused, struck it with the Mad Scepter and ordered it dragged to the stocks.
		Over the coming months, the boy Karroch sneaked food and medicinal draughts to the wounded creature, but only managed to slow its deterioration. Wordlessly, the beast spoke to the boy, and over time their bond strengthened until the boy found he could hold up his end of a conversation.  He could, in fact, speak now to all the creatures of the King's menagerie. On the night the beast died, a rage came over the boy.  He incited the animals of the court to rebel and threw open their cages to set them amok on the palace grounds.  The Last King was mauled in the mayhem. In the chaos, one regal stag bowed to the boy who had freed him; and with Beastmaster astride him, leapt the high walls of the estate, and escaped. Now a man, Karroch the Beastmaster has not lost his ability to converse with wild creatures. He has grown into a warrior at one with nature's savagery.
hype: Summoning a poison-spitting boar and a scouting hawk to aid his hunt, Beastmaster never stalks the battlefield unprepared. Chopping through the forest with his axes, his stunning roar opens the way for his allies to devastate enemies.

abilities.name: Wild Axes
abilities.affects:
ABILITY: Point Target
AFFECTS: Enemy Heroes, Enemy Creeps
DAMAGE TYPE: Physical
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
DISPELLABLE: Yes
abilities.description:
Beastmaster sends his axes flying and calls them home again, slicing through enemy units and trees along their path. Each axe can hit an enemy once, and amplifies subsequent damage from Beastmaster and his units.

Aghanim's Scepter Upgrade: Causes Wild Axes to have no cooldown, and can be used again once they come back.
abilities.notes: This ability destroys trees.
abilities.attrib:
RANGE: 1500
DAMAGE PER AXE: 30,60,90,120
%DAMAGE AMP PER STACK: 6,8,10,12
SCEPTER COOLDOWN: 0
abilities.lore: While learning to maneuver in nature alone, the Beastmaster also mastered the use of a pair of tomahawks, adept at cutting down trees as well as adversaries.

abilities.name: Call of the Wild Boar
abilities.affects: ABILITY: No Target
abilities.description: Beastmaster calls forth a Boar to aid in the battlefield.
abilities.attrib:
SUMMON DURATION: 60,60,60,60
BOAR HEALTH: 300,450,600,750
BOAR ATTACK DAMAGE: 16,32,48,64
%BOAR SLOW: 10,20,30,40
BOAR POISON DURATION: 3
abilities.lore: After befriending the strange beast of his childhood, Beastmaster has learned to call to animals in times of need.

abilities.name: Call of the Wild Hawk
abilities.affects: ABILITY: Point Target, AOE
abilities.description: Beastmaster sends an invisible Hawk to scout an area.
abilities.attrib:
SUMMON DURATION: 60
HAWK HEALTH: 150,200,250,300
HAWK SPEED: 300,340,380,420
HAWK VISION: 600,700,800,900
abilities.lore: After befriending the strange beast of his childhood, Beastmaster has learned to call to animals in times of need.

abilities.name: Inner Beast
abilities.affects:
ABILITY: Passive
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: Yes
abilities.description: Untaps the inner fury of nearby allies, passively increasing their attack speed.
abilities.attrib:
RADIUS: 1200
BONUS ATTACK SPEED: 10,20,30,40
abilities.lore: Beastmaster's ability to incite the innate strength of animals was seen in the mauling of the king of Slom.

abilities.name: Primal Roar
abilities.affects:
ABILITY: Unit Target
AFFECTS: Enemy Heroes, Enemy Creeps
DAMAGE TYPE: Magical
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: Yes
DISPELLABLE: Yes, strong dispell
abilities.description: Beastmaster lets loose a deafening roar that stuns, and shoves open a path to its target. All units in the path of the roar are damaged, while units shoved aside by the roar have their movement and attack speed slowed. Additionally, Beastmaster and his units gain 40% movement speed for 3 seconds.
abilities.notes: The stun will hit Spell Immune units. The damage will not.
abilities.attrib:
STUN DURATION: 3,3.5,4
DAMAGE: 150,225,300
SLOW DURATION: 3,3.5,4
SHOUT WIDTH: 300
%MOVEMENT SLOW: -60
ATTACK SLOW: -60
abilities.lore: The Beastmaster has learned to channel his primal instincts into an animalistic roar, causing devastation in the ranks of enemies.

name: Juggernaut
bio: No one has ever seen the face hidden beneath the mask of Yurnero the Juggernaut. It is only speculation that he even has one. For defying a corrupt lord, Yurnero was exiled from the ancient Isle of Masks--a punishment that saved his life. The isle soon after vanished beneath the waves in a night of vengeful magic. He alone remains to carry on the Isle's long Juggernaut tradition, one of ritual and swordplay. The last practitioner of the art, Yurnero's confidence and courage are the result of endless practice; his inventive bladework proves that he has never stopped challenging himself. Still, his motives are as unreadable as his expression. For a hero who has lost everything twice over, he fights as if victory is a foregone conclusion.
hype: In a flurry of slashes, Juggernaut cuts down his foes. Sprinting and spinning into battle with reckless abandon, and nearly invincible once he is able to begin his assault, stopping Juggernaut can often be just as difficult as surviving him.

abilities.name: Blade Fury
abilities.affects:
ABILITY: No Target
DAMAGE TYPE: Magical
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
DISPELLABLE: No
abilities.description: Causes a bladestorm of destructive force around Juggernaut, rendering him immune to magic and dealing damage to nearby enemy units. \n\nDISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel
abilities.notes:
You can use items during Blade Fury.
Juggernaut can still perform attacks while in Blade Fury. However, only units that are not affected by Blade Fury, such as wards or structures, will take damage from these attacks.
abilities.attrib:
RADIUS: 250
DAMAGE: 85,110,135,160
DURATION: 5
abilities.lore: Yurnero's renowned katana techniques are feared by warriors and sorcerors alike.

abilities.name: Healing Ward
abilities.affects:
ABILITY: Point Target, AOE
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: Yes
abilities.description: Summons a Healing Ward which heals all nearby allied units, based on their max health. The Healing Ward moves at 350 movement speed after being summoned. Lasts 25 seconds.
abilities.notes:
The healing ward can be controlled.
Multiple healing wards do not stack.
abilities.attrib: %MAX HEALTH PER SECOND: <font color="#bdc3c7">2,3,4,5</font>
abilities.lore: Of the rituals learned at the Isle of Masks, tending wounds with a bit of voodoo magic has proven to be quite useful.

abilities.name: Blade Dance
abilities.affects: ABILITY: Passive
abilities.description: Gives Juggernaut a chance to deal critical damage on each attack.
abilities.attrib:
%CRITICAL DAMAGE: 180
%CRITICAL CHANCE: 20,25,30,35
abilities.lore: The last remnant of his heritage's commitment to bladework, Yurnero ensures that the style is remembered.

abilities.name: Omnislash
abilities.affects:
ABILITY: Unit Target
AFFECTS: Enemy Heroes, Enemy Creeps
DAMAGE TYPE: Physical
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: Yes
DISPELLABLE: No
abilities.description:
Juggernaut leaps towards the target enemy units, and then slashes the target and other nearby enemy units at an increased attack rate. Juggernaut is invulnerable for the duration.

Aghanim's Scepter Upgrade: Increases duration and decreases cooldown.
abilities.notes:
You can use items during Omnislash.
Can target Spell Immune units.
Omnislash applies a basic dispel to Juggernaut on cast.
abilities.attrib:
SLASHES RATE MULTIPLIER: 1.7
BONUS DAMAGE: 30,40,50
DURATION: 3,3.25,3.5
SLASH JUMP RADIUS: 425
SCEPTER DURATION: 4,4.25,4.5
SCEPTER COOLDOWN: 70
abilities.lore: 'The fruits of discipline; with practice comes strength.'

name: Faceless Void
bio: Darkterror the Faceless Void is a visitor from Claszureme, a realm outside of time. It remains a mystery why this being from another dimension believes the struggle for the Nemesis Stones is worth entering our physical plane, but apparently an upset in the balance of power in this world has repercussions in adjacent dimensions. Time means nothing to Darkterror, except as a way to thwart his foes and aid his allies. His long-view of the cosmos has given him a remote, disconnected quality, although in battle he is quite capable of making it personal.
hype: Time is everything to Faceless Void. He speeds time to dash between locations, manipulates it to dodge attacks, stops it in a large area to devastate his foes, and given enough of it to gather resources, he can make himself unbelievably powerful.

abilities.name: Time Walk
abilities.affects:
ABILITY: Point Target, Directional
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: Yes
abilities.description: Rushes to a target location while backtracking any damage taken the last 2 seconds.
abilities.notes: Faceless Void is invulnerable while using Time Walk.
abilities.attrib:
RANGE: 675
BACKTRACK DURATION: 2
abilities.lore: Darkterror tears a hole in time, passing through Claszureme, and appearing back in an instant.

abilities.name: Time Dilation
abilities.affects:
ABILITY: No Target
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
DISPELLABLE: Yes
abilities.description: Faceless Void traps all nearby enemies in a time dilation field for 6,8,10,12 seconds, extending their cooldowns and slowing their movement and attack speed by 14%% for each cooldown extended.
abilities.notes: Does not affect item cooldowns.
abilities.attrib:
RADIUS: 775
DURATION: 6,8,10,12
%SLOW PER COOLDOWN: 14
abilities.lore: For those facing off against Darkterror, each moment seems to stretch into eternity.

abilities.name: Time Lock
abilities.affects:
ABILITY: Passive
DAMAGE TYPE: Magical
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: Yes
DISPELLABLE: Yes, strong dispell
abilities.description: Adds the chance for an attack to lock an enemy unit in time while attacking it a second time.
abilities.notes:
Does not stack with Skull Basher.
Stun works on Spell Immune units.
abilities.attrib:
%CHANCE: 12,16,20,24
DURATION: 0.75
BONUS DAMAGE: 25,30,35,40
abilities.lore: The strike of the Faceless Void lands with dimension shifting force.

abilities.name: Chronosphere
abilities.affects:
ABILITY: Point Target, AOE
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: Yes
DISPELLABLE: No
abilities.description:
Creates a blister in spacetime, trapping all units caught in its sphere of influence and causes you to move very quickly inside it. Only Faceless Void and any units he controls are unaffected. Invisible enemies in the sphere will be revealed.

Aghanim's Scepter Upgrade: Decreases cooldown.
abilities.notes:
Pauses all units and buildings, friendly or enemy, except those owned by Faceless Void.
Faceless Void is never affected by Chronospheres with any owner.
abilities.attrib:
RADIUS: 450
DURATION: 4,4.5,5
SCEPTER COOLDOWN: 60
abilities.lore: When a rift opens to Claszureme, all poor souls caught within will likely never return.

talents.name: +25% Backtrack
talents.description: Grants a %value%%% chance to avoid damage entirely.

name: Axe
bio: As a grunt in the Army of Red Mist, Mogul Khan set his sights on the rank of Red Mist General. In battle after battle he proved his worth through gory deed. His rise through the ranks was helped by the fact that he never hesitated to decapitate a superior. Through the seven year Campaign of the Thousand Tarns, he distinguished himself in glorious carnage, his star of fame shining ever brighter, while the number of comrades in arms steadily dwindled. On the night of ultimate victory, Axe declared himself the new Red Mist General, and took on the ultimate title of 'Axe.' But his troops now numbered zero. Of course, many had died in battle, but a significant number had also fallen to Axe's blade. Needless to say, most soldiers now shun his leadership. But this matters not a whit to Axe, who knows that a one-man army is by far the best.
hype: One after another, Axe cuts down his foes. Marching ahead of his team, he locks his enemies in battle then counters their blows with a deadly spin of his weapon. Slamming his culling blade through a weakened enemy, he is always charging onward.

abilities.name: Berserker's Call
abilities.affects:
ABILITY: No Target
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: Yes
DISPELLABLE: No
abilities.description: Axe taunts nearby enemy units, forcing them to attack him, while he gains bonus armor during the duration.
abilities.attrib:
RADIUS: 300
BONUS ARMOR: 30
DURATION: 2,2.4,2.8,3.2
abilities.lore: Mogul Khan's warcry taunts opponents into engaging in an unconquerable battle with the Axe.

abilities.name: Battle Hunger
abilities.affects:
ABILITY: Unit Target
AFFECTS: Enemy Heroes, Enemy Creeps
DAMAGE TYPE: Magical
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
DISPELLABLE: Yes
abilities.description:
Enrages an enemy unit, causing it to be slowed and take damage over time until it kills another unit or the duration ends. Axe gains movement speed for each unit affected with Battle Hunger, half speed from creeps.

Aghanim's Scepter Upgrade: Causes Battle Hunger to be an area of effect ability, and reduces the damage output of affected enemy units.
abilities.notes: Destroying buildings will also remove the debuff.
abilities.attrib:
DURATION: 12
%MOVEMENT SLOW: -12
%SPEED BONUS: 12
DAMAGE PER SECOND: 16,24,32,40
%SCEPTER DAMAGE REDUCTION: 30
SCEPTER AOE: 400

DAMAGE TYPE: Pure
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: Yes

abilities.notes: Counter Helix triggers when the attack hits.
abilities.attrib:
DAMAGE: 60,100,140,180
RADIUS: 275
%CHANCE TO HELIX: 20
abilities.lore: Axe is the only reinforcement this army needs.

abilities.name: Culling Blade
abilities.affects:
ABILITY: Unit Target
AFFECTS: Enemy Heroes, Enemy Creeps
DAMAGE TYPE: Magical
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: Yes
DISPELLABLE: Yes
abilities.description: Axe spots a weakness and strikes, instantly killing an enemy unit with low health, or dealing moderate damage otherwise. When an enemy hero is killed with Culling Blade, its cooldown is reset, and Axe and nearby allied units gain bonus movement speed.
abilities.attrib:
KILL THRESHOLD: 250,325,400
DAMAGE: 150,250,300
%KILL MOVE SPEED BONUS: 30
KILL ATTACK SPEED BONUS: 30
KILL SPEED RADIUS: 900
KILL SPEED DURATION: 6
abilities.lore: Mogul Khan is the embodiment of battle and fury, launching into a gruesome fatality against those who dare engage the Axe in combat.

talents.name: Attacking Procs Counter Helix
talents.description: Your own attacks against enemy units also have a chance to trigger Counter Helix.

name: Lina
bio: The sibling rivalries between Lina the Slayer, and her younger sister Rylai, the Crystal Maiden, were the stuff of legend in the temperate region where they spent their quarrelsome childhoods together. Lina always had the advantage, however, for while Crystal was guileless and naive, Lina's fiery ardor was tempered by cleverness and conniving. The exasperated parents of these incompatible offspring went through half a dozen homesteads, losing one to fire, the next to ice, before they realized life would be simpler if the children were separated. As the oldest, Lina was sent far south to live with a patient aunt in the blazing Desert of Misrule, a climate that proved more than comfortable for the fiery Slayer. Her arrival made quite an impression on the somnolent locals, and more than one would-be suitor scorched his fingers or went away with singed eyebrows, his advances spurned. Lina is proud and confident, and nothing can dampen her flame.
hype: As deadly as she is fragile, Lina effortlessly strikes down any foe foolish enough to be caught alone. Gaining attack speed with each spell she casts, she scours enemies with flame and heat lightning, ensuring few can survive her assaults.

abilities.name: Dragon Slave
abilities.affects:
ABILITY: Point Target, Unit Target
AFFECTS: Enemy Heroes, Enemy Creeps
DAMAGE TYPE: Magical
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
abilities.description: Lina channels the breath of a dragon, sending out a wave of fire that scorches every enemy in its path.
abilities.notes: Dragon Slave can hit units up to 1225 units away.
abilities.lore: In the scorched barren of Misrule, Lina learned to manipulate the fiery breath of the Desert Wyrm as a form of entertainment.

abilities.name: Light Strike Array
abilities.affects:
ABILITY: Point Target, AOE
DAMAGE TYPE: Magical
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
DISPELLABLE: Yes, strong dispell
abilities.description: Summons a column of flames that damages and stuns enemies.
abilities.notes: Light Strike Array will destroy trees in its area of effect.
abilities.attrib:
RADIUS: 225
STUN DURATION: 1.6,1.9,2.2,2.5
CAST DELAY: 0.5
DAMAGE: 80,120,160,200
abilities.lore: Lina's essence allows her to focus the sun's energies, causing air to combust at will.

abilities.name: Fiery Soul

DISPELLABLE: No

abilities.notes:
Duration refreshes each time a new spell is cast.
Using items does not trigger Fiery Soul.
abilities.attrib:
ATTACK SPEED BONUS: 40,55,70,85
%MOVE SPEED BONUS: 5,6,7,8
MAX STACKS: 3
DURATION: 10
abilities.lore: Dancing flames embody Lina's playful nature, bringing out her true blazing self.

abilities.name: Laguna Blade
abilities.affects:
ABILITY: Unit Target
AFFECTS: Enemy Heroes, Enemy Creeps
DAMAGE TYPE: Magical
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
abilities.description:
Fires off a bolt of lightning at a single enemy unit, dealing massive damage.

Aghanim's Scepter Upgrade: Changes Laguna Blade's damage type to Pure, and allows it to slice through spell immunity.
abilities.notes: Laguna Blade has a 0.25 delay before the damage is applied after the spell is cast, allowing certain abilities to avoid the damage.
abilities.attrib: DAMAGE: <font color="#bdc3c7">450,650,850</font>
abilities.lore: The air around Lina becomes so intensely torrid that it scorches a foe that comes too close with white-hot lightning.

name: Chen
bio:
Born in the godless Hazhadal Barrens, Chen came of age among the outlaw tribes who eked out an existence in the shimmering heat of the desert.  Using an ancient form of animal enthrallment, Chen's people husbanded the hardy desert locuthi, a stunted species of burrowing dragon that melted desert sands into tubes of glass where twice-a-year rains collected.  Always on the edge of starvation and thirst, fighting amongst their neighbors and each other, Chen's clan made the mistake, one fateful day, of ambushing the wrong caravan.
		In the vicious battle that followed, Chen's clan was outmatched.  The armored Knights of the Fold made short work of the enthralled locuthi, who attacked and died in waves.  With their dragons dead, the tribesmen followed. Chen struggled, and slashed, and clawed, and perished--or would have. Defeated, on his knees, he faced his execution with humility, offering his neck to the blade. Moved by Chen's obvious courage, the executioner halted his sword. Instead of the blade, Chen was given a choice: death or conversion. Chen took to the faith with a ferocity. He joined the Fold and earned his armor one bloody conversion at a time. Now, with the fanaticism of a convert, and with his powers of animal enthrallment at their peak, he seeks out unbelievers and introduces them to their final reward.
hype: Converting the creatures of the forest to his cause, Chen leads his makeshift armies to aid his team in battle. He assaults enemies with beasts while sending friends to safety. Then, when things seem darkest, he heals his allies wherever they may be.

abilities.name: Penitence
abilities.affects:
ABILITY: Unit Target
AFFECTS: Enemy Heroes, Enemy Creeps
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
DISPELLABLE: Yes
abilities.description: Forces an enemy unit to move slower and for allies to attack it more quickly.
abilities.attrib:
DURATION: 5,6,7,8
%MOVEMENT SLOW: -18,-24,-30,-36
BONUS ATTACK SPEED: 30,60,90,120
abilities.lore: Although Chen's brand of animal enthrallment isn't quite strong enough to control the minds of enemy heroes, it still tests their resolve in combat.

abilities.name: Holy Persuasion
abilities.affects:
ABILITY: Unit Target
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: Yes
DISPELLABLE: No
abilities.description:
Chen takes control of an enemy or neutral creep. If the persuaded creep's base health is naturally below the health minimum, its base health will be raised to the health minimum. Converted creeps will have increased movement speed and bonus damage.

Aghanim's Scepter Upgrade: Allows Holy Persuasion to target Ancient Creeps, maximum one per level of Hand of God.
abilities.notes:
Persuading a new creep above max unit count causes the oldest persuaded creep to die.
Can target Ancient Creeps when Chen has Aghanim's Scepter.
The health of creeps already under Chen's control does not update to the new level upon leveling Holy Persuasion further.
Fully restores the creep's mana upon converting.
abilities.attrib:
MAX UNITS: 1,2,3,4
CREEP MAX LEVEL: 4,5,6,6
MOVE SPEED BONUS: 10,15,20,25
BONUS DAMAGE: 8,16,24,32
HEALTH MINIMUM: 1000
abilities.lore: Although they may not be knights, Chen incorporates beasts into the Fold in the same way he himself was converted.

abilities.name: Divine Favor
abilities.affects:
ABILITY: Unit Target
AFFECTS: Allied Heroes, Allied Creeps
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: Yes
DISPELLABLE: Yes
abilities.description: Passively provides an aura that grants increased health regeneration and amplifies all health restore by a percentage.\n\nCan be cast on allies to teleport them to Chen. If cast on Chen, all units controlled by Chen will be teleported to him. Taking damage will dispel the buff.
abilities.attrib:
%HEAL INCREASE: 8,12,16,20
REGEN PER SEC: 2,3,4,5
TELEPORT DELAY: 6

abilities.name: Hand of God
abilities.affects:
ABILITY: No Target
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: Yes
abilities.description: Heals all allied heroes on the map as well as all units under Chen's control.
abilities.notes: Can heal invulnerable and hidden/banished allies.
abilities.attrib:
HEAL: 250,425,600
SCEPTER HOLY PERSUASION ANCIENTS: 1,2,3
abilities.lore: Using the mental link with his thralls, Chen calls down restoration and well-being to those who share his fanaticism.

name: Enigma
bio:
Nothing is known of Enigma's background. There are only stories and legends, most of them apocryphal, passed down through the ages. In truth, Enigma is a mystery for whom the only true biography is description: he is a universal force, a consumer of worlds. He is a being of the void, at times corporeal, other times ethereal. A beast between the planes.
		There are stories that say he was once a great alchemist who tried to unlock the secrets of the universe and was cursed for his arrogance. Other legends tell that he is an ancient being of strange gravity, the abyss personified--a twisted voice from out the original darkness, before the first light in the universe. And there are older legends that say he is the first collapsed star, a black hole grown complicated and sentient--his motivations unknowable, his power inexorable, a force of destruction unleashed upon existence itself.
hype: Widely feared for his ultimate ability, Enigma can summon a black hole capable of entrapping enemy forces, so that allies can then destroy them. An ever-present contingent of eidolons at his side, he pummels foes with ranged attacks.

abilities.name: Malefice
abilities.affects:
ABILITY: Unit Target
AFFECTS: Enemy Heroes, Enemy Creeps
DAMAGE TYPE: Magical
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
DISPELLABLE: Yes
abilities.description: Focuses Enigma's power on a target, causing it to take damage and become repeatedly stunned for multiple instances. An instance strikes every 2,2,2,2 seconds.
abilities.attrib:
STUN DURATION: 0.4,0.6,0.8,1
DAMAGE PER HIT: 30,50,70,90
INSTANCES: 3,3,3,3
abilities.lore: Strange gravities pull at the core of those who would oppose you, holding them in place.

abilities.name: Demonic Conversion
abilities.affects: ABILITY: Unit Target
abilities.description: Transforms a creep into three fragments of Enigma himself. These eidolons are all under Enigma's control, and repeated successful attacks cause them to multiply. When this happens, the eidolons have their health restored.
abilities.notes:
Converted enemy units will give gold bounty and experience.
Converted allied units will be denied.
abilities.attrib:
ATTACKS TO MULTIPLY: 6,6,6,6
SPAWN COUNT: 3,3,3,3
EIDOLON HP: 180,200,220,240
EIDOLON DAMAGE: 20,28,38,47
DURATION: 35
abilities.lore: Enigma is capable of drawing aspects of himself from other dimensions - the result is a trio of dark eidolons that hunt the corporeal plane.

abilities.name: Midnight Pulse
abilities.affects:
ABILITY: Point Target, AOE
DAMAGE TYPE: Pure
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: Yes
abilities.description: Steeps an area in dark resonance, damaging enemy units based on their max HP.
abilities.notes:
Damage goes through spell immunity.
This ability destroys trees in its area.
Multiple instances of Midnight Pulse will stack.
abilities.attrib:
DURATION: 9,10,11,12
%DAMAGE PER SECOND: 3.5,4,4.5,5
RADIUS: 550
abilities.lore: A section of the world slowly descends into the void.

abilities.name: Black Hole
abilities.affects:
ABILITY: Point Target, Channeled, AOE
DAMAGE TYPE: Pure
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: Yes
abilities.description:
CHANNELED - Summons a vortex that sucks in nearby enemy units. Enemies affected by Black Hole cannot move, attack, or cast spells.

Aghanim's Scepter Upgrade: Adds the current level of Midnight Pulse to Black Hole.
abilities.notes: Disables enemies through spell immunity.
abilities.attrib:
DAMAGE PER SECOND: 50,100,150
RADIUS: 420
DURATION: 4,4,4
abilities.lore: The ground trembles as Enigma channels his ultimate vortex of destruction, a singularity with the power to end worlds.

name: Lich
bio: In life, the frost-mage Ethreain (not yet a Lich) had used the threat of destructive ice to enslave entire kingdoms. His subjects, aided by a few desperate magicians, eventually grew bold enough to ambush him. Armed with enough charmed rope to bind him forever, they tied the frost mage to adamant weights and dropped him in a pool known chiefly for being bottomless. It wasn't. He only fell for a year or so before an outcrop snagged him. There he rested, dead but undecaying, until the geomancer Anhil thought to verify the legend of the supposedly bottomless Black Pool. Anhil's plumbline snarled with the ropes that bound the drowned magician, and up he hauled an unexpected prize. Thinking that by rendering the dead undead, he could question the Lich about the properties of the pool, he removed the bindings and commenced a simple rite of resurrection. Even the descendants of Ethreain's enemies were long forgotten by time, so there were none to warn Anhil against imprudence. But he learned the error of his judgment almost immediately, as Lich threw off the shackles and consumed him.
hype: Drifting from battle to battle and sacrificing creeps to fuel his assaults, Lich is always ready to help his fellow heroes destroy their enemies with slowing frost. Should his foes be foolish enough to gather, his bouncing ultimate will ensure their demise.

abilities.name: Frost Blast
abilities.affects:
ABILITY: Unit Target, AOE
AFFECTS: Enemy Heroes, Enemy Creeps
DAMAGE TYPE: Magical
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
DISPELLABLE: Yes
abilities.description: Blasts the target enemy unit with damaging frost, dealing area damage and slowing movement and attack rates for 4,4,4,4 seconds. The primary target receives both base and area damage.
abilities.attrib:
AREA DAMAGE: 75,100,125,150
RADIUS: 200,200,200,200
%MOVEMENT SLOW: -30
ATTACK SLOW: -30
abilities.lore: Frost-mage Ethreain has not forgotten even the simplest of ice manipulation.

abilities.name: Frost Shield
abilities.affects:
ABILITY: Unit Target
AFFECTS: Allied Heroes, Allied Creeps, Allied Buildings
DAMAGE TYPE: Magical
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: undefined
DISPELLABLE: Yes
abilities.description: Applies a magical frost shield around the target, reducing damage from attacks against you. While the shield is active, ice magic will affect nearby enemy units every 1 seconds, dealing minor damage and slowing them.
abilities.notes:
Spell-immune enemies are not affected by the damage or slow.
Frost Shield can be cast on buildings.
abilities.attrib:
%DAMAGE REDUCTION: 30,40,50,60
DAMAGE: 20,30,40,50
%SLOW: 20,25,30,35
SLOW DURATION: 0.5
BUFF DURATION: 6
abilities.lore: First conceived of to protect him in his mortal years, the frost magic that Ethreain weaves around himself has only grown colder with time.

abilities.name: Sinister Gaze
abilities.affects:
ABILITY: Unit Target, Channeled
AFFECTS: Enemy Heroes, Enemy Creeps
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
DISPELLABLE: Yes
abilities.description: CHANNELED - Hypnotizes an enemy unit, causing it to move towards a point between the two of you.
abilities.attrib:
DURATION: 1.6,1.9,2.2,2.5
%DISTANCE MOVED: 32,38,44,50
CAST RANGE: 500,525,550,575
abilities.lore: Mind the cold...

abilities.name: Chain Frost
abilities.affects:
ABILITY: Unit Target
AFFECTS: Enemy Heroes, Enemy Creeps
DAMAGE TYPE: Magical
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
DISPELLABLE: Yes
abilities.description:
Releases an orb of frost that bounces between nearby enemy units up to 10,10,10 times, slowing and damaging each time it hits. \n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

Aghanim's Scepter Upgrade: Increases damage and casting range. Removes the limit on the number of times Chain Frost can jump.
abilities.notes:
Chain Frost cannot be disjointed.
Chain Frost has a movement speed of 850.
Chain Frost doesn't bounce to Zombies.
abilities.attrib:
DAMAGE EACH BOUNCE: 250,400,550
BOUNCES: 10,10,10
BOUNCE RANGE: 600
%MOVEMENT SLOW: -65
ATTACK SLOW: -65
SLOW DURATION: 2.5
SCEPTER DAMAGE: 400,500,600
abilities.lore: Almost universally considered the ultimate in frost magic, Ethreain's orb of frozen death strikes fear into those who dare stand against him.

talents.name: Attacks Apply 60% MS and AS Slow

name: Mirana
bio: Born to a royal family, a blood princess next in line for the Solar Throne, Mirana willingly surrendered any claim to mundane land or titles when she dedicated herself completely to the service of Selemene, Goddess of the Moon. Known ever since as Princess of the Moon, Mirana prowls the sacred Nightsilver Woods searching for any who would dare poach the sacred luminous lotus from the silvery pools of the Goddess's preserve. Riding on her enormous feline familiar, she is poised, proud and fearless, attuned to the phases of the moon and the wheeling of the greater constellations. Her bow, tipped with sharp shards of lunar ore, draws on the moon's power to charge its arrows of light.
hype: As she takes aim from a distance with her deadly arrow, Mirana must always be ready to leap into battle. Able to shield her allies from the eyes of her enemies, she ensures that her team is always on the prowl.

abilities.name: Starstorm
abilities.affects:
ABILITY: No Target
DAMAGE TYPE: Magical
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
abilities.description:
Calls down a wave of meteors to damage nearby enemy units. The closest enemy unit to Mirana in a 425 radius will be struck a second time for 75%% of the damage.

Aghanim's Scepter Upgrade: Passively triggers Starstorm every 8 seconds. Does not trigger if the enemy doesn't see Mirana.
abilities.notes:
Starstorm is not blocked by Linken's Sphere.
Starstorm cannot hit invisible units.
Starstorm will choose a new target for the second star if the first died before impact.
abilities.attrib:
RADIUS: 650
SCEPTER INTERVAL: 8
abilities.lore: The Goddess breaks the strata to empower her Princess in the time of need.

abilities.name: Sacred Arrow
abilities.affects:
ABILITY: Point Target, Directional
DAMAGE TYPE: Magical
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
DISPELLABLE: Yes, strong dispell
abilities.description: Fires a long-range arrow with deadly precision, which stuns and damages the first enemy unit it strikes. The stun duration ranges from 0.01 to 5 seconds, with bonus damage up to 140 added, based on the distance the arrow travels to its target. Instantly kills the first non-ancient creep it hits.
abilities.notes:
For every 150 distance the arrow travels, the stun duration upon impact increases by 0.5 seconds, and the bonus damage added increases by 14.
Sacred Arrow can hit invisible units.
abilities.attrib:
RANGE: 3000
MINIMUM STUN: 0.01
MAXIMUM STUN: 5
MAXIMUM BONUS DAMAGE: 140
abilities.lore: Lunar energies make the Princess of the Moon's arrows more deadly than most.

abilities.name: Leap
abilities.affects:
ABILITY: No Target
DISPELLABLE: Yes
abilities.description: Mirana leaps forward into battle, empowering herself with a ferocious roar that grants bonus attack and movement speed. Speed bonus lasts 2.5 seconds.
abilities.attrib:
DISTANCE: 550
%MOVEMENT BONUS: 8,16,24,32
ATTACK SPEED BONUS: 60,80,100,120
MAX CHARGES: 3
CHARGE REPLENISH TIME: 45,40,35,30
abilities.lore: None can fail to recognize Mirana's iconic white beast in the heat of battle.

abilities.name: Moonlight Shadow
abilities.affects:
ABILITY: No Target
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: Yes
DISPELLABLE: No
abilities.description: Turns Mirana and all allied heroes invisible and grants bonus movment speed. If a hero is revealed, invisibility will restore after the fade delay as long as Moonlight Shadow's duration has not expired.
abilities.notes:
Units affected will not auto attack enemies.
Spell Immune allies will be affected.
abilities.attrib:
FADE DELAY: 2.5,2,1.5
DURATION: 18
%MOVEMENT SPEED: 15
abilities.lore: Her tenure with Selemene allows Mirana to eclipse the ground, wrapping her allies in a cloak of shadows.

talents.name: +2 Multishot Sacred Arrows
talents.description: The extra arrows are launched in a cone shape, 30 degrees to the left and right of the original arrow, and cannot hit the same target.

name: Nature's Prophet
bio: When Verodicia, Goddess of the Woods, had finished filling in the green places, having planted the coiled-up spirit in the seed, having lured the twining waters from deep within the rock, having sworn the sun its full attention to the growing things, she realized that her own time had reached its end, and like one of the leaves whose fate she had imprinted in the seed, she would fall without seeing the fruiting of her dream. It pained her to leave the world bereft, for the sprouts had not yet broken through the soil--and they would be tender and vulnerable to every sort of harm. She found in her seed pouch one last seed that she had missed in the sowing. She spoke a single word into the seed and swallowed it as she fell. Her vast body decomposed throughout the long winter, becoming the humus that would feed the seedlings in the spring. And on the morning of the vernal equinox, before the rest of the forest had begun to wake, that last seed ripened and burst in an instant. From it stepped Nature's Prophet, in full leaf, strong and wise, possessing Verodicia's power to foresee where he would be needed most in defense of the green places--and any who might be fortunate enough to call him an ally.
hype: Whether in the thick of battle or gathering resources for his next assault, Nature's Prophet seems to be everywhere. Teleporting at will to any location and instantly creating an army of violent trees to fight for him, he attacks where enemies least expect.

abilities.name: Sprout
abilities.affects:
ABILITY: Point Target, Unit Target
AFFECTS: Units Heroes, Units Creeps
abilities.description: Sprouts a ring of trees around a unit, trapping it in place, and providing vision in a 500 radius.
abilities.notes:
Sprout can be cast on any unit, or the ground.
Trees created by Sprout have the same interactions with abilities as regular trees.
abilities.attrib:
DURATION: 3,4,5,6
CAST RANGE: 625,700,775,850
abilities.lore: Verdant overgrowth is a common ailment reported by Nature's Prophet's attackers.

abilities.name: Teleportation
abilities.affects:
ABILITY: Point Target
DISPELLABLE: No
abilities.description: Teleports to any point on the map.
abilities.notes:
Teleport takes 3 seconds to cast.
Mana and cooldown take effect when the cast is completed. Nature's Prophet will not use any mana or waste the cooldown if the spell is interrupted while casting.
When the cast begins, an effect is created at the target location, which is visible to allies and enemies.
abilities.lore: The Prophet keeps his sentinel over the forest, protecting it when in need.

abilities.name: Nature's Call
abilities.affects: ABILITY: Point Target, AOE
abilities.description: Converts an area of trees into Treants under the command of Nature's Prophet.
abilities.notes: Nature's Call can only create as many treants as there are trees in the target area.
abilities.attrib:
TREANT DURATION: 60,60,60,60
TREANT COUNT: 2,3,4,5
TREANT HEALTH: 550
TREANT DAMAGE: 24,28,32,36
abilities.lore: Verodicia bestowed the Prophet with the ability to summon the Treant Guard, a mythical sentient army of the wild.

abilities.name: Wrath of Nature
abilities.affects:
ABILITY: Point Target, Unit Target
AFFECTS: Enemy Heroes, Enemy Creeps
DAMAGE TYPE: Magical
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
abilities.description:
Damaging energy bounces around the map, striking enemies close to the cast point that are in vision. Each enemy hit beyond the first adds damage.

Aghanim's Scepter Upgrade: Increases damage. If a unit is killed by Wrath of Nature, or within 4 seconds thereafter, a Nature's Call treant will spawn. These treants' health and damage are based on the current level of Nature's Call. If a hero is killed, a Greater Treant will be created, which has 3 times as much health and damage.
abilities.notes:
Wrath of Nature will not hit units out of vision.
Can be cast through the minimap; the nearest valid target will be selected.
abilities.attrib:
MAX TARGETS: 18
DAMAGE: 110,140,170
%ADDED DAMAGE PER BOUNCE: 11
SCEPTER DAMAGE: 135,170,205
SCEPTER TREANT SPAWN TIMER: 4
abilities.lore: Nature's Prophet calls Verodicia's fury to strike down those who might ravage the wilderness.

name: Bane
bio: When the gods have nightmares, it is Bane Elemental who brings them.  Also known as Atropos, Bane was born from the midnight terrors of the goddess Nyctasha.  A force of terror too powerful to be contained by sleep, he surfaced from her slumbers, fed upon her immortality, and stole his vaporous form from her inky blood.  He is the essence of fear.  Mortals who hear his voice hear their darkest secrets whispered in their ear.  He calls to the hidden fear in every Hero's heart.  Wakefulness is no protection, for Bane's black blood, continuously dripping, is a tar that traps his enemies in nightmare.  In the presence of Bane, every Hero remembers to fear the dark.
hype: Bane brings terror to his enemies with his arsenal of disabling abilities. Whether trapping a foe within a contagious nightmare, or gripping an enemy in place, he gives allies all the time they need to slay their enemy.

abilities.name: Enfeeble
abilities.affects:
ABILITY: Unit Target
AFFECTS: Enemy Heroes
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
DISPELLABLE: Yes
abilities.description: Lower's the target's status resistance and attack speed.
abilities.attrib:
%STATUS RESISTANCE REDUCTION: 36,44,52,60
ATTACK SPEED REDUCTION: 50,75,100,125
DURATION: 8

abilities.name: Brain Sap
abilities.affects:
ABILITY: Unit Target
AFFECTS: Enemy Heroes, Enemy Creeps
DAMAGE TYPE: Pure
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
abilities.description:
Feasts on the vital energies of an enemy unit, healing Bane and dealing damage.

Aghanim's Scepter Upgrade: Decreases cooldown, cast point, and makes Brain Sap pierce Spell Immunity.
abilities.attrib:
DAMAGE: 75,150,225,300
HEAL AMOUNT: 75,150,225,300
SCEPTER COOLDOWN: 1.5
SCEPTER CAST POINT: 0.2
abilities.lore: Atropos finds no greater pleasure than to harvest the fear he creates.

abilities.name: Nightmare
abilities.affects:
ABILITY: Unit Target
AFFECTS: Units Heroes, Units Creeps
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
DISPELLABLE: Yes
abilities.description: Puts the target enemy or friendly Hero to sleep. Sleeping units are awakened when damaged. If the target was directly attacked, the Nightmare passes to the attacking unit. Bane can attack nightmared targets freely.
abilities.notes:
In the first second of Nightmare, the unit is invulnerable.
Bane can wake himself from Nightmare.
On cast, replaced with Nightmare End: Ends all ongoing Nightmares on any affected units.
abilities.attrib:
CAST RANGE: 425,500,575,650
DURATION: 4,5,6,7
abilities.lore: A stolen prowess from the goddess Nyctasha is to put his prey into forever sleep.

abilities.name: Fiend's Grip
abilities.affects:
ABILITY: Unit Target, Channeled
AFFECTS: Enemy Heroes, Enemy Creeps
DAMAGE TYPE: Magical
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: Yes
DISPELLABLE: Yes, strong dispell
abilities.description: CHANNELED - Grips an enemy unit, disabling it and causing heavy damage over time, while stealing mana every 0.5 seconds based on the unit's maximum mana.
abilities.notes: Fiend's Grip will disable and drain mana from Spell Immune units, but not damage them.
abilities.attrib:
DAMAGE: 100,155,215
DURATION: 6
%MANA DRAIN: 5
abilities.lore: Victims of Atropos are frequently torn apart by vivid conjurations of their own nightmares.

talents.name: Enfeeble Steals Attack Speed
talents.description: Bane gains attack speed equal to the attack speed stolen for the duration of Enfeeble.

name: Bloodseeker
bio: Strygwyr the Bloodseeker is a ritually sanctioned hunter, Hound of the Flayed Twins, sent down from the mist-shrouded peaks of Xhacatocatl in search of blood. The Flayed Ones require oceanic amounts of blood to keep them sated and placated, and would soon drain their mountain empire of its populace if the priests of the high plateaus did not appease them. Strygwyr therefore goes out in search of carnage. The vital energy of any blood he lets, flows immediately to the Twins through the sacred markings on his weapons and armor. Over the years, he has come to embody the energy of a vicious hound; in battle he is savage as a jackal. Beneath the Mask of the Bloodseeker, in the rush of bloody quenching, it is said that you can sometime see the features of the Flayers taking direct possession of their Hound.
hype: Bloodseeker forces difficult decisions on his enemies. Able to drive his foes to a retreat by bathing a large area with a damaging ritual, his gruesome ultimate asks his opponents to hold still, or die.

abilities.name: Bloodrage
abilities.affects:
ABILITY: Unit Target
AFFECTS: Units Heroes, Units Creeps
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
DISPELLABLE: Yes
abilities.description: Drives a unit into a bloodthirsty rage during which a unit deals, and takes, increased damage. Units affected by Bloodrage will be healed for a percentage of the max health of any units they kill. Units affected by Bloodrage when killed will heal a percentage of their max health to their killer. If you do not get the last hit, but are within 300 AoE of the dying hero, you will take 50% of the heal.
abilities.notes: Bloodrage can be cast on enemy and allied units, as well as Bloodseeker himself.
abilities.attrib:
DURATION: 9,10,11,12
%DAMAGE INCREASE: 10,15,20,25
%KILL HEAL PERCENTAGE: 16,19,22,25
abilities.lore: Strygwyr shares his animalistic thirst for bloodshed.

abilities.name: Blood Rite
abilities.affects:
ABILITY: Point Target, AOE
DAMAGE TYPE: Pure
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
DISPELLABLE: Yes
abilities.description: Bloodseeker baptizes an area in sacred blood. After 2.9 seconds the ritual completes, causing any enemies caught in the area to take damage and become silenced.
abilities.notes: Total time is a %delay% second delay plus a %castpoint_tooltip% second cast time.
abilities.attrib:
SILENCE DURATION: 3,4,5,6
DAMAGE: 125,175,225,275
RITUAL AREA: 600
abilities.lore: The Flayed Twins are ever willing to aid those who spill blood upon the field of battle.

abilities.name: Thirst
abilities.affects:
ABILITY: Passive
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
abilities.description: Bloodseeker is invigorated by the wounds of his enemies, gaining bonus movement speed and attack speed whenever an enemy hero's health falls below 75%%, with the bonuses increasing as their health falls further. If an enemy hero's health falls below 25%%, he will also gain vision and True Sight of that hero. Bonuses stack per hero.
abilities.notes:
Not triggered by Illusions.
Max movement speed and attack speed bonuses occur when an enemy's health is at or below %max_bonus_pct%%%.
Effects linger for %linger_duration% seconds if a target dies.
abilities.attrib:
%THIRST HEALTH THRESHHOLD: 75
%MAX THIRST MOVE SPEED: 12,24,36,48
MAX ATTACK SPEED: 30,45,60,75
%VISIBILITY HEALTH THRESHHOLD: 25
abilities.lore: Strygwyr becomes frenzied when blood is spilled.

abilities.name: Rupture
abilities.affects:
ABILITY: Unit Target
AFFECTS: Enemy Heroes, Enemy Creeps
DAMAGE TYPE: Pure
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: Yes
DISPELLABLE: No
abilities.description:
Causes an enemy unit's skin to rupture. If the unit moves, it takes damage based on the distance moved. The damage is dealt through spell immunity.

Aghanim's Scepter Upgrade: Grants 2 charges to Rupture with a 40 seconds replenish time.
abilities.attrib:
DURATION: 12
%MOVE DAMAGE: 30,45,60
CAST RANGE: 800
SCEPTER CHARGES: 2
SCEPTER REPLENISH TIME: 40
abilities.lore: When the Bloodseeker hunts you, injuries become fatalities.

name: Crystal Maiden
bio: Born in a temperate realm, raised with her fiery older sister Lina, Rylai the Crystal Maiden soon found that her innate elemental affinity to ice created trouble for all those around her. Wellsprings and mountain rivers froze in moments if she stopped to rest nearby; ripening crops were bitten by frost, and fruiting orchards turned to mazes of ice and came crashing down, spoiled. When their exasperated parents packed Lina off to the equator, Rylai found herself banished to the cold northern realm of Icewrack, where she was taken in by an Ice Wizard who had carved himself a hermitage at the crown of the Blueheart Glacier. After long study, the wizard pronounced her ready for solitary practice and left her to take his place, descending into the glacier to hibernate for a thousand years. Her mastery of the Frozen Arts has only deepened since that time, and now her skills are unmatched.
hype: Able to keep her allies supplied with mana as she slows down enemies to ensure a kill, Crystal Maiden is a helpful addition to any team. And, when the opportunity arises, she can unleash her massive ultimate ability to devastate her foes.

abilities.name: Crystal Nova
abilities.affects:
ABILITY: Point Target, AOE
DAMAGE TYPE: Magical
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
DISPELLABLE: Yes
abilities.description: A burst of damaging frost slows enemy movement and attack rate in the targeted area.
abilities.attrib:
DURATION: 4.5
%MOVEMENT SLOW: -20,-30,-40,-50
ATTACK SLOW: -20,-30,-40,-50
RADIUS: 425
DAMAGE: 130,170,210,260
abilities.lore: The air temperature around Rylai drops rapidly, chilling all around her to the core.

abilities.name: Frostbite
abilities.affects:
ABILITY: Unit Target
AFFECTS: Enemy Heroes, Enemy Creeps
DAMAGE TYPE: Magical
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
DISPELLABLE: Yes
abilities.description: Encases an enemy unit in ice, prohibiting movement and attack, while dealing damage over time. Lasts 10 seconds on creeps level 6 or lower.
abilities.notes: Frostbite is considered a root.

HERO TOTAL DAMAGE: 150,200,250,300
CREEP TOTAL DAMAGE: 1000
HERO DURATION: 1.5,2,2.5,3
CREEP DURATION: 10
abilities.lore: Rylai channels winds from the Blueheart Glacier, imprisoning attackers in thick blocks of ice.

abilities.name: Arcane Aura
abilities.affects:
ABILITY: Passive
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: Yes
abilities.description: Gives additional mana regeneration to all friendly units on the map. This bonus is increased for Crystal Maiden.
abilities.notes:
Stacks with other flat mana regeneration bonuses.
The flat mana regeneration bonus is not considered for percentage mana regeneration increases.
abilities.attrib:
ALLY MANA REGEN: 1,1.5,2,2.5
SELF MANA REGEN: 2.5,4.5,6.5,8.5
abilities.lore: Cold temperatures promote the essence of magic, causing Rylai's presence to allow spell usage in abundance.

abilities.name: Freezing Field
abilities.affects:
ABILITY: No Target, Channeled
DAMAGE TYPE: Magical
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
abilities.description:
CHANNELED - Surrounds Crystal Maiden with random icy explosions that slow enemies and deal massive damage. Grants bonus armor while channeling. Lasts 10 seconds.

Aghanim's Scepter Upgrade: Applies Frostbite to any unit that has been standing in the Freezing Field for over a set amount of time.
abilities.notes:
The slow is applied on all enemies in the radius, even if they aren't hit by an explosion (lasts %slow_duration% second).
Explosions occur every %explosion_interval% seconds.
abilities.attrib:
%MOVEMENT SLOW: -30
ATTACK SLOW: -60
RADIUS: 835
EXPLOSION RADIUS: 300
DAMAGE: 105,170,250
BONUS ARMOR: 20
SCEPTER FROSTBITE DELAY: 2.5
abilities.lore: Once the place of her exile, Icewrack has become an anchor for Rylai's frigid onslaught.

name: Morphling
bio: For dark eons the comet circled. Held in thrall to a distant sun, bound by gravity's inexorable pull, the massive ball of ice careened through the blackness between worlds, made strange by its dark journey. On the eve of the ancient war of the Vloy, it punched down through the sky and lit a glowing trail across the night, a sign both armies took for an omen. The frozen ball melted in a flash of boiling heat, as below two forces enjoined in battle across the border of a narrow river. Thus freed from its icy stasis, the Morphling was born into conflict, an elemental power at one with the tides of the ocean, capricious and unconstrained. He entered the fight, instinctively taking the form of the first general who dared set foot across the water, and then struck him dead. As the motley warriors clashed, he shifted from form to form throughout the battle, instantly absorbing the ways of these strange creatures--now a footsoldier, now an archer, now the cavalryman--until, by the time the last soldier fell, Morphling had played every part. The battle's end was his beginning.
hype: Shifting his attributes to suit his situation, Morphling can be as elusive as he is deadly. Whether riding a wave to flank an enemy, or boosting his health before escaping into his deceptive replication, few can hope to corner him.

abilities.name: Waveform
abilities.affects:
ABILITY: Point Target
DAMAGE TYPE: Magical
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
abilities.description: Morphling dissolves into liquid and surges forward, damaging enemy units in his path. Morphling is invulnerable during Waveform.
abilities.attrib: RANGE: <font color="#bdc3c7">700,800,900,1000</font>
abilities.lore: A torrential flood takes enemies by force.

abilities.name: Adaptive Strike (Agility)
abilities.affects:
ABILITY: Unit Target
AFFECTS: Enemy Heroes, Enemy Creeps
DAMAGE TYPE: Magical
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
abilities.description: Launches a surge of water toward an enemy unit, dealing base damage plus additional damage based on Morphling's agility times a multiplier. If Morphling's agility is 50%% higher than strength, the maximum agility multiplier is used. \n\n Also puts Adaptive Strike (Strength) on a 3 second cooldown.
abilities.notes: Projectile moves at %projectile_speed% speed.
abilities.attrib:
BASE DAMAGE: 70,80,90,100
DAMAGE MAX AGI MULTIPLIER: 1,1.5,2,2.5
DAMAGE MIN AGI MULTIPLIER: 0.5
CAST RANGE: 600,700,800,900
abilities.lore: The Morphling calls upon his elements to crush his opponents with waves.

abilities.name: Adaptive Strike (Strength)
abilities.affects:
ABILITY: Unit Target
AFFECTS: Enemy Heroes, Enemy Creeps
DAMAGE TYPE: Magical
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
DISPELLABLE: Yes, strong dispell
abilities.description: Launches a surge of water toward an enemy unit, stunning and knocking back the target based on Morphling's strength. If his strength is 50%% higher than his agility, the maximum stun/knockback is dealt. \n\n Also puts Adaptive Strike (Agility) on a 3 second cooldown.
abilities.notes: Projectile moves at %projectile_speed% speed.
abilities.attrib:
STUN MAX: 1.5,2,2.5,3
STUN MIN: 0.5
KNOCKBACK MAX: 500
KNOCKBACK MIN: 100
CAST RANGE: 600,700,800,900
abilities.lore: The Morphling calls upon his elements to crush his opponents with waves.

abilities.name: Attribute Shift (Agility Gain)
abilities.affects: ABILITY: No Target, Toggle
abilities.description: Morphling shifts its form, pulling points from Strength and pouring them into Agility. The process is reversible. Additional points in Attribute Shift increase the rate of stat change. Passively grants bonus Agility.
abilities.notes:
Attribute Shift can't convert stats from items.
Leveling up Agility Gain will also level up Strength Gain.
abilities.attrib:
SHIFT RATE: 1,4,10,25
BONUS AGILITY: 1,3,5,7
abilities.lore: Shifting water makes it difficult to discern the nature of Morphling.

abilities.name: Attribute Shift (Strength Gain)
abilities.affects: ABILITY: No Target, Toggle
abilities.description: Morphling shifts its form, pulling points from Agility and pouring them into Strength. The process is reversible. Additional points in Attribute Shift increase the rate of stat change. Passively grants bonus Strength.
abilities.notes:
Attribute Shift can't convert stats from items.
Leveling up Strength Gain will also level up Agility Gain.
abilities.attrib:
SHIFT RATE: 1,4,10,25
BONUS STRENGTH: 1,3,5,7
abilities.lore: Shifting water makes it difficult to discern the nature of Morphling.

abilities.name: Morph
abilities.affects:
ABILITY: Unit Target
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: Yes
DISPELLABLE: No
abilities.description:
Morphling changes his form to match the targeted enemy, gaining their basic abilities. Can be toggled for the duration of the ability.

Aghanim's Scepter Upgrade: Allows targeting allied heroes. While Morphed, you gain Manacost Reduction and Cast Range increase.
abilities.notes: You can't target yourself with Morph.
abilities.attrib:
DURATION: 20
%SCEPTER MANA COST REDUCTION: 50
SCEPTER BONUS CAST RANGE: 600
abilities.lore: Staring into Morphling produces a reflection that mimics the beholder.

talents.name: Waveform Attacks Targets
talents.description: Enemies hit by Waveform are also instantly attacked by Morphling.

talents.name: +3 Multishot Adaptive Strike
talents.description: Two additional enemy units within cast range are also targeted by Adaptive Strike.

abilities_special.name: Hybrid
abilities_special.affects: ABILITY: Unit Target
abilities_special.description: Morphling creates a hybrid replication of a target allied hero, which can cast all of that hero's current, non-ultimate abilities. Enemies are able to see which unit is a hybrid.

abilities_hidden.name: Morph Replicate
abilities_hidden.description: Toggles Morphling's form between his own and the replicated enemy.

name: Anti-Mage
bio: The monks of Turstarkuri watched the rugged valleys below their mountain monastery as wave after wave of invaders swept through the lower kingdoms. Ascetic and pragmatic, in their remote monastic eyrie they remained aloof from mundane strife, wrapped in meditation that knew no gods or elements of magic. Then came the Legion of the Dead God, crusaders with a sinister mandate to replace all local worship with their Unliving Lord's poisonous nihilosophy. From a landscape that had known nothing but blood and battle for a thousand years, they tore the souls and bones of countless fallen legions and pitched them against Turstarkuri. The monastery stood scarcely a fortnight against the assault, and the few monks who bothered to surface from their meditations believed the invaders were but demonic visions sent to distract them from meditation. They died where they sat on their silken cushions. Only one youth survived--a pilgrim who had come as an acolyte, seeking wisdom, but had yet to be admitted to the monastery. He watched in horror as the monks to whom he had served tea and nettles were first slaughtered, then raised to join the ranks of the Dead God's priesthood. With nothing but a few of Turstarkuri's prized dogmatic scrolls, he crept away to the comparative safety of other lands, swearing to obliterate not only the Dead God's magic users--but to put an end to magic altogether.
hype: Should Anti-Mage have the opportunity to gather his full strength, few can stop his assaults. Draining mana from enemies with every strike or teleporting short distances to escape an ambush, cornering him is a challenge for any foe.

abilities.name: Mana Break
abilities.affects:
ABILITY: Passive
DAMAGE TYPE: Physical
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
abilities.description: Burns an opponent's mana on each attack. Mana Break deals 50%% of the mana burned as damage to the target.
abilities.attrib: MANA BURNED PER HIT: <font color="#bdc3c7">28,40,52,64</font>
abilities.lore: A modified technique of the Turstarkuri monks' peaceful ways is to turn magical energies on their owner.

abilities.name: Blink
abilities.affects: ABILITY: Point Target
abilities.description: Short distance teleportation that allows Anti-Mage to move in and out of combat.
abilities.notes: You can use Blink to dodge incoming projectiles.
abilities.attrib: RANGE: <font color="#bdc3c7">925,1000,1075,1150</font>
abilities.lore: In his encounter with the Dead Gods, Anti-Mage learned the value of being elusive.

abilities.name: Counterspell
abilities.affects:
ABILITY: No Target
DISPELLABLE: Yes
abilities.description: Passively grants you magic resistance. Can be activated to create an anti-magic shell around you that sends any targeted spells back towards enemies instead of affecting you.
abilities.attrib:
%MAGIC RESISTANCE: 15,25,35,45
DURATION: 1.2

abilities.name: Mana Void
abilities.affects:
ABILITY: Unit Target, AOE
AFFECTS: Enemy Heroes, Enemy Creeps
DAMAGE TYPE: Magical
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: Yes
abilities.description:
For each point of mana missing by the target unit, damage is dealt to it and surrounding enemies. The main target is also mini-stunned.

Aghanim's Scepter Upgrade: Increases stun duration. Mana Void kills cause the enemy's highest cooldown ability to take longer to cool down upon respawning.
abilities.notes:
The stun passes through spell immunity.
Damage is calculated based on the primary target's mana, but applied to all enemies within the area of effect.
abilities.attrib:
DAMAGE: 0.8,0.95,1.1
STUN DURATION: 0.3
RADIUS: 500
SCEPTER COOLDOWN INCREASE: 70
SCEPTER STUN DURATION: 1.3
abilities.lore: After bringing enemies to their knees, Anti-Mage punishes them for their use of the arcane arts.

talents.name: Blink Uncontrollable Illusion
talents.description: After blinking, an uncontrollable illusion is created at Anti-Mage's original location.  Deals 25%% damage, takes %incoming_damage%%% damage, and lasts %illusion_duration% seconds.

name: Dark Seer
bio:
Fast when he needs to be, and a cunning strategist, Ish'Kafel the Dark Seer requires no edged weapons to vanquish his enemies, relying instead on the strength of his powerful mind. His talent lies in his ability to maneuver the fight to his advantage. Hailing from a place he calls 'The Land behind the wall,' Dark Seer remains an outsider here--a warrior from a realm beyond the veil of this reality.
		Once a great general among his people, and a valiant defender of the god-king Damathryx, Dark Seer's army was wiped out by a much larger force in the final days of the Great Boundaries War. Facing certain defeat, he made one last desperate act: he led the enemy forces into the maze between the walls. At the last moment, just before capture, he crossed over--then sealed the walls forever in an explosive release of dark energy. When the dust settled, he saw that he had saved his people but found himself blinking at the sun of a different world, with no way to return.  Now he is committed to proving his worth as a military strategist, and vows to show that he's the greatest tactician this strange new world has ever seen.
hype: Versatile and strategic, Dark Seer excels at manipulating the positions of his enemies. Vacuuming foes into the attacks of his allies, he can turn enemy strength against itself by pulling foes through his replicating wall.

abilities.name: Vacuum
abilities.affects:
ABILITY: Point Target, AOE
DAMAGE TYPE: Magical
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
DISPELLABLE: Yes, strong dispell
abilities.description: Dark Seer creates a vacuum over the target area that sucks in enemy units, disrupting them and dealing damage.
abilities.notes:
This ability interrupts channeling.
Pulls units over %duration% seconds before dealing damage.
Doesn't pull invulnerable units.
Trees near the center of the vacuum will be destroyed.
abilities.attrib:
RADIUS: 400,450,500,550
DAMAGE: 50,100,150,200
CAST RANGE: 450,500,550,600
abilities.lore: Ish'Kafel modifies the center of gravity to a place of his choosing.

abilities.name: Ion Shell
abilities.affects:
ABILITY: Unit Target
AFFECTS: Units Heroes, Units Creeps
DAMAGE TYPE: Magical
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
DISPELLABLE: Yes
abilities.description: Surrounds the target unit with a bristling shield that damages enemy units in an area around it.
abilities.notes:

Doesn't damage the target it is cast on.
If cast on a unit that already has Ion Shell, the new Shell replaces the old one.
abilities.attrib:
RADIUS: 250
DURATION: 25
DAMAGE PER SECOND: 24,46,68,90
abilities.lore: The Dark Seer slices holes into the 'Land Behind the Wall,' causing prismatic energy to seep forth.

abilities.name: Surge
abilities.affects:
ABILITY: Unit Target
AFFECTS: Allied Heroes, Allied Creeps
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: Yes
DISPELLABLE: Yes
abilities.description: Charges a target friendly unit with power, giving it a brief burst of movement speed and removes unit collisions. Allows the unit to surpass the movement speed limit and cannot be slowed.
abilities.notes: Units with Surge cannot be slowed unless the Surge effect is removed.
abilities.attrib:
DURATION: 6
%SPEED BONUS: 25,40,55,70
abilities.lore: Ish'Kafel once used his speed of mind to navigate the maze between the walls.

abilities.name: Wall of Replica
abilities.affects:

DAMAGE TYPE: Magical
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: Yes
abilities.description:
Raises a wall of warping light that slows and creates replicas of any enemy hero who crosses it. Enemy replicas serve at the Dark Seer's will. Replicas last until they are destroyed, or until the wall's duration ends.

Aghanim's Scepter Upgrade: Increases the damage dealt by illusions.
abilities.notes:
Doesn't create illusions from other illusions.
There cannot be more than one illusion per player per wall.
Wall of replica will not slow spell-immune enemies.

%REPLICA DAMAGE: 70,85,100
%REPLICA DAMAGE TAKEN: 200
CAST RANGE: 1300
%SCEPTER REPLICA DAMAGE: 100,120,140
%MOVEMENT SLOW: 50,60,70
SLOW DURATION: 0.75
abilities.lore: The Dark Seer, while unable to return to his natural realm, can channel part of the prismatic wall with powerful strength of mind, sowing confusion amongst enemy ranks.

talents.name: Parallel Wall
talents.description: A second Wall of Replica is created 600 units behind the first wall.  Illusions are independent for each Wall.

name: Kunkka
bio: As The Admiral of the mighty Claddish Navy, Kunkka was charged with protecting the isles of his homeland when the demons of the Cataract made a concerted grab at the lands of men. After years of small sorties, and increasingly bold and devastating attacks, the demon fleet flung all its carnivorous ships at the Trembling Isle. Desperate, the Suicide-Mages of Cladd committed their ultimate rite, summoning a host of ancestral spirits to protect the fleet. Against the demons, this was just barely enough to turn the tide. As Kunkka watched the demons take his ships down one by one, he had the satisfaction of wearing away their fleet with his ancestral magic. But at the battle's peak, something in the clash of demons, men and atavistic spirits must have stirred a fourth power that had been slumbering in the depths. The waves rose up in towering spouts around the few remaining ships, and Maelrawn the Tentacular appeared amid the fray. His tendrils wove among the ships, drawing demon and human craft together, churning the water and wind into a raging chaos. What happened in the crucible of that storm, none may truly say. The Cataract roars off into the void, deserted by its former denizens. Kunkka is now The Admiral of but one ship, a ghostly rig which endlessly replays the final seconds of its destruction. Whether he died in that crash is anyone's guess. Not even Tidehunter, who summoned Maelrawn, knows for sure.
hype: Kunkka is always predicting where his enemies will go next. Able to attack a location with a geyser of water or a ghostly shipwreck, should his aim prove true, he and his allies will have no trouble cleaning up whatever is left.

abilities.name: Torrent

DAMAGE TYPE: Magical
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
DISPELLABLE: Yes
abilities.description: Summons a rising torrent that, after a short delay, hurls enemy units into the sky, stunning, dealing damage and slowing movement speed.
abilities.notes:
The initial bubble effect is only visible to allies and provides vision in fog of war.
Units tossed in the air will be stunned and still able to be attacked.

SLOW DURATION: 1.75,2.5,3.25,4
STUN DURATION: 1.6
%MOVE SLOW: -35
RADIUS: 225
DAMAGE: 75,150,225,300

AFFECTS: Enemy Heroes, Enemy Creeps
DAMAGE TYPE: Physical
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: Yes

abilities.notes: Cleave damage goes through spell immunity.

DAMAGE BONUS: 25,50,75,100

CLEAVE RANGE: 650,800,950,1100
abilities.lore: A lost Claddish soul inhabits Kunkka's trusty Tidebringer, empowering it to destroy demons of the Cataract.

abilities.name: X Marks the Spot

ABILITY: Unit Target
AFFECTS: Units Heroes
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No

abilities.description: Targets a friendly or enemy Hero, marks their position with an X, and returns them to it after several seconds. Kunkka can trigger the return at any time during the duration. Lasts twice as long on allied heroes.

abilities.notes:

talents.description: Spawns 3 Ghostships, 2.8 seconds apart, towards the target location.

abilities_hidden.name: Return

ABILITY: No Target

name: Necrophos
bio: In a time of great plague, an obscure monk of dark inclinations, one Rotund'jere, found himself promoted to the rank of Cardinal by the swift death of all his superiors. While others of the order went out to succor the ill, the newly ordained cardinal secluded himself within the Cathedral of Rumusque, busily scheming to acquire the property of dying nobles, promising them spiritual rewards if they signed over their terrestrial domains. As the plague receded to a few stubborn pockets, his behavior came to the attention of the greater order, which found him guilty of heresy and sentenced him to serve in the plague ward, ensorcelled with spells that would ensure him a slow and lingering illness. But they had not counted on his natural immunity. Rotund'jere caught the pox, but instead of dying, found it feeding his power, transforming him into a veritable plague-mage, a Pope of Pestilence. Proclaiming himself Necrophos, he travels the world, spreading plague wherever he goes, and growing in terrible power with every village his pestilential presence obliterates.
hype: Wherever Necrophos goes, enemies wither as allies thrive. Restoring health to his friends and harming enemies with each death pulse, once his very presence has eaten away at an enemy, he summons the reaper to lengthen their stay in the afterlife.

abilities.name: Death Pulse
abilities.affects:
ABILITY: No Target
DAMAGE TYPE: Magical
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No

abilities.notes:

Can heal Spell Immune units.
abilities.attrib:
RADIUS: 500
HEAL: 60,80,100,120
abilities.lore: Poor souls who succumb to Rotund'jere's plagues are recycled for future use.

abilities.affects:
ABILITY: No Target
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
DISPELLABLE: Yes

ABILITY: Unit Target
AFFECTS: Enemy Heroes
DAMAGE TYPE: Magical
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: Yes
DISPELLABLE: No
abilities.description:
Stuns the target enemy hero, then deals damage based on how much life it is missing. Heroes killed by Reaper's Scythe will have 15,25,35 seconds added to their respawn timer. Any kill under this effect is credited to Necrophos.

Aghanim's Scepter Upgrade: Reduces cooldown.

name: Lifestealer
bio: In the dungeons of Devarque, a vengeful wizard lay in shackles, plotting his escape. He shared his cell with a gibbering creature known as N'aix, a thief cursed by the Vile Council with longevity, so that its life-sentence for theft and cozening might be as punishing as possible. Over the years, its chains had corroded, along with its sanity; N'aix retained no memory of its former life and no longer dreamt of escape. Seeing a perfect vessel for his plans, the wizard wove a spell of Infestation and cast his life-force into N'aix's body, intending to compel N'aix to sacrifice itself in a frenzy of violence while the mage returned to his body and crept away unnoticed. Instead, the wizard found his mind caught in a vortex of madness so powerful that it swept away his plans and shattered his will. Jarred to consciousness by the sudden infusion of fresh life, N'aix woke from its nightmare of madness and obeyed the disembodied voice that filled its skull, which had only the one thought: To escape. In that moment Lifestealer was born. The creature cast its mind into dungeon guards and soldiers, compelling them to open locks and cut down their companions, opening an unobstructed path to freedom while feeding on their lives. Lifestealer still wears the broken shackles as a warning that none may hold him, but on the inside remains a prisoner. Two minds inhabit the single form--a nameless creature of malevolent cunning, and the Master whose voice he pretends to obey.
hype: Should Lifestealer get close to his prey, there is little that can save them. Travelling within a creep or an allied hero, once he nears a foe he explodes from his host body, surprising enemies and tearing into them with his claws.

abilities.name: Rage
abilities.affects:
ABILITY: No Target
DISPELLABLE: No
abilities.description: Launch into a maddened rage, becoming Spell Immune, 100% resistant to magic damage, and gaining increased attack speed.\n\nDISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel
abilities.notes: Upon casting, many buffs and debuffs will be removed.
abilities.attrib:
ATTACK SPEED BONUS: 40,50,60,70
DURATION: 3,4,5,6
abilities.lore: The madness and brutality of N'aix makes him a vicious and unrelenting foe in combat.

abilities.name: Feast

ABILITY: Passive
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: Yes

abilities.notes:
Does not affect Roshan.
Affects Spell Immune units.
The heal is independent of the damage.
Stacks additively with other sources of Lifesteal.
abilities.attrib: %LIFE STEAL: <font color="#bdc3c7">1.5,2.25,3,3.75</font>
abilities.lore: After escaping from his cell in Devarque, N'aix subsisted on flesh and bones of those unfortunate to cross his path.

abilities.name: Open Wounds
abilities.affects:
ABILITY: Unit Target
AFFECTS: Enemy Heroes, Enemy Creeps
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
DISPELLABLE: Yes
abilities.description: Lifestealer rends an enemy unit, slowing the victim's movement speed and allowing all allies to regain health for a percentage of the damage they deal to that unit. All damage dealt will steal life, including damage from spells. The victim recovers movement speed over the duration.
abilities.notes:
Open Wounds slows over 8 different steps: 70%% / 70%% / 60%% / 50%% / 30%% / 10%% / 10%% / 10%%, with the slow decreasing one step per second.
Stacks additively with other sources of Lifesteal.
abilities.attrib:
%LIFE STEAL: 50
%MAX SLOW: 70
DURATION: 8
CAST RANGE: 200,300,400,500
abilities.lore: Fresh wounds and the scent of blood often draw out the scavengers to finish the job.

abilities.name: Infest
abilities.affects:
ABILITY: Unit Target
DAMAGE TYPE: Magical
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: Yes
DISPELLABLE: No
abilities.description:
Lifestealer infests the body of a target unit, becoming undetectable inside. He can then explode from the host body, dealing damage to nearby enemies. If the infested unit is an enemy creep or a neutral creep, he can take control of the unit's ability to move and attack, and when consumed the creep will heal Lifestealer's health equal to the creep's current health. Does not work on enemy heroes.\n\nDISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel

Aghanim's Scepter Upgrade: Grants new ability: Assimilate. Swallows an allied hero, allowing them to hide within him.
abilities.notes:
If the infested unit dies before Lifestealer consumes it, no health is gained.
Lifestealer gains experience while under the effects of Infest.
Creeps that are controlled while Infested share Lifestealer's movement speed.
Infest Level 2 and 3 can be used on Ancient creeps.
abilities.attrib:
DAMAGE: 150,275,400
DAMAGE RADIUS: 700,700,700
abilities.lore: With this infestation, N'aix consumes the life blood of the host, restoring him back to full unholy power.

abilities_aghs.name: Assimilate
abilities_aghs.affects:
Requires Aghanim's Scepter to unlock. ABILITY: Unit Target
AFFECTS: Allied Heroes
DAMAGE TYPE: Magical
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: Yes
DISPELLABLE: No
abilities_aghs.description: Lifestealer swallows an allied hero, allowing them to hide within him. Any healing Lifestealer receives is shared with the hero within. When an assimilated hero leaves Lifestealer, they erupt outward, damaging nearby enemies.\n\nDISPEL TYPE: Strong Dispel
abilities_aghs.lore: How can Lifestealer resist the chance to sample an ally?

abilities_hidden.name: Control
abilities_hidden.description: Lifestealer seizes control of the host body's nervous system, allowing him to issue movement and attack orders from within. Controlled units share Lifestealer's movement speed. Cannot be used on heroes.

abilities_hidden.name: Consume
abilities_hidden.description: Lifestealer eats the host body from the inside out, exploding from within.

abilities_hidden.name: Eject
abilities_hidden.affects:
ABILITY: No Target
DAMAGE TYPE: Magical
abilities_hidden.description: Ejects an Assimilated hero, damaging nearby enemies.

name: Earthshaker
bio: Like a golem or gargoyle, Earthshaker was one with the earth but now walks freely upon it. Unlike those other entities, he created himself through an act of will, and serves no other master. In restless slumbers, encased in a deep seam of stone, he became aware of the life drifting freely above him. He grew curious. During a season of tremors, the peaks of Nishai shook themselves loose of avalanches, shifting the course of rivers and turning shallow valleys into bottomless chasms. When the land finally ceased quaking, Earthshaker stepped from the settling dust, tossing aside massive boulders as if throwing off a light blanket. He had shaped himself in the image of a mortal beast, and named himself Raigor Stonehoof. He bleeds now, and breathes, and therefore he can die. But his spirit is still that of the earth; he carries its power in the magical totem that never leaves him. And on the day he returns to dust, the earth will greet him as a prodigal son.
hype: Whether blocking an enemy's escape, dividing their forces, or shattering the ground beneath gathered foes, Earthshaker is at his best when he strikes without warning. Whatever survives the aftershocks still has a swing from his mighty totem to look forward to.

abilities.name: Fissure
abilities.affects:
ABILITY: Point Target
AFFECTS: Enemy Heroes, Enemy Creeps
DAMAGE TYPE: Magical
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
DISPELLABLE: Yes, strong dispell
abilities.description: Slams the ground with a mighty totem, creating an impassable ridge of stone while stunning and damaging enemy units along its line.
abilities.notes:
Creeps will wait for Fissure to disappear. They will not attempt to walk around it.
Fissure is not blocked by Linken's Sphere.
abilities.attrib:
FISSURE RANGE: 1400
FISSURE DURATION: 8
STUN DURATION: 1,1.25,1.5,1.75
abilities.lore: The Nishian totem splits the world to its core with tectonic force.

abilities.name: Enchant Totem
abilities.affects:
ABILITY: No Target
AFFECTS: Enemy Heroes, Enemy Creeps
DISPELLABLE: Yes
